titles.title: SF502 I know that my Redeemer lives,

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I know that my Redeemer lives,
and ever prays for me;
a token of his love he gives,
a pledge of liberty.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I find him lifting up my head,
he brings salvation near,
his presence makes me free indeed,
and he will soon appear.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He wills that I should holy be;
what can withstand his will?
The counsel of his grace in me
he surely shall fulfil.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Jesus, I hang upon your word;
I steadfastly believe
you will return and claim me, Lord,
and to yourself receive.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Your love I soon expect to find
in all its depth and height,
to comprehend the eternal mind,
and grasp the Infinite.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
When God is mine, and I am his,
of paradise possessed,
I taste unutterable bliss
and everlasting rest.
